verses.roman:
hasta, pada, śira saba śarīra-bhitare
praviṣṭa haya--kūrma-rūpa dekhiye prabhure

synonyms: hasta—the hands; pada—the legs; śira—head; saba—all; śarīra—the body; bhitare—within; praviṣṭa—entered; haya—is; kūrma-rūpa—like a tortoise; dekhiye—one sees; prabhure—the Lord.
translation: Sometimes Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's hands, legs and head would all enter within His body, just like the withdrawn limbs of a tortoise.
